conversation.text: I think you'll find that "A Farewell to Arms" and "A Bridge Too Far" might be right up your alley, given your interest in military themes! Both films explore the complexities of war and its impact on individuals and societies. In "A Farewell to Arms", you'll follow the tragic love story of an American ambulance driver and an English nurse amidst the chaos of World War I. Meanwhile, "A Bridge Too Far" is a gripping epic that recreates the pivotal Operation Market Garden mission during WWII, featuring an all-star cast including Sean Connery, Robert Redford, and Laurence Olivier.
